title: 3 in 4 consumers want property agents to stay updated by closing at least one deal a year: Survey
content: Consumers also wanted agents to negotiate better prices and terms for their clients.

title: Brothers fined after swopping seats to cover up for driving against oncoming traffic
content: Older brother tried to cover up for brother by lying to police that he was the driver.

title: Man allegedly linked to international scam syndicate faces 6 charges including cheating
content: Ng Hsien Fu was arrested in Malaysia on June 3 and handed over to the Singapore authorities.

title: Retail competition aims to rejuvenate Singapore mall scene by offering free rent, financial support
content: The first edition of the competition is seeking out local brands with the innovative store concepts.

title: WP co-opts 4 rookie MPs into CEC, NCMP Eileen Chong to head youth wing

title: Insurer Great Eastern pauses pre-authorisation certificates for Mount Elizabeth admissions
content: The insurer said that high costs, compared to other private hospitals, were the reason for this decision.

title: 3 men arrested over evasion of more than $800k in cigarette duties and taxes
